fields.Title of Contribution: Los de abajo: Rasquache Political Resistance through Cultural Studies
fields.Description/Abstract:
This research is part of the NEH grant that I am involved with these next two years (2017-2019).  This essay will be sent out if the matching funding falls through (500,000).  We are working with the Office for Sponsored projects to raise funds for this project.  i will continue with the research since I have put over 6 months into it as it stands.

The note above is from 2018-2019. The matching funds were not reached for the $500,000 NEH grant, but we were able to ask for a matching grant for less. I have been doing this research with only one course compensation, thus I am waiting to hear on the status of the grant before I can publish this research in the way the other participants on the project want to disseminate the research. This sets me back on my research, but the work is being done.
